summary: Diff adds a new "Creations/Templates" navigation section and panel in the creator dashboard, introduces a gallery UI with Templates/Creations tabs, and adds backend state fields (published/isShared) plus a migration to backfill defaults. React Query hooks appear to be added/used for templates, published projects, and publish/unpublish, but backend API implementations for listing templates/creating from template/publish workflows are not fully verifiable from the truncated backend diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes an API to list built-in templates and an API to create a new project from a template ID; frontend uses them so a created project appears and becomes selectable/active.
missing_requirements.reason: While backend types/stores for Template are present and the frontend calls hooks like useGetTemplates/useCreateProjectFromTemplate, the diff summary for backend/main.mo is truncated before any concrete template API methods are shown, and no template initialization is evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes publish/unpublish APIs with owner/admin enforcement and an API to list published projects; only published projects appear in the gallery creations list.
missing_requirements.reason: Project types include published/isShared and the frontend uses publish/unpublish hooks, but the backend/main.mo diff is truncated before any publish/unpublish/listPublishedProjects methods (and their authorization filtering) are shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add React Query hooks and cache invalidation for templates listing, published creations listing, and publish/unpublish mutations; gallery updates after changes without reload; errors show user-friendly message.
missing_requirements.reason: Components import and use the expected hooks, but the diff summary for frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts is truncated before the relevant hook implementations and any invalidateQueries/refetch behavior for published creations can be confirmed from evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Landing page changes including a pricing section and a Facebook link in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which focuses on an authenticated creator-dashboard gallery feature set).

hallucinated_features.description: Broad visualizer engine and mode enhancements (e.g., WebGL support detection, new rendering integrations/refactors) unrelated to the gallery/templates/publishing scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and outside the specified gallery/templates/publish feature additions.
